verses.verse: Bezalel <WH1212> made <WH6213> the ark <WH727> of acacia <WH7848> wood. <WH6086> Its length <WH753> was two and a half <WH2677> cubits, <WH520> and its breadth <WH7341> a cubit <WH520> and a half, <WH2677> and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> its height. <WH6967>
He overlaid <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> inside <WH1004> and outside, <WH2351> and made <WH6213> a molding <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> for it around it. <WH5439>

He cast <WH3332> four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> for it, <WH702> in its four feet; <WH6471> even two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on its one <WH259> side, <WH6763> and two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on its other <WH8145> side. <WH6763>
He made <WH6213> poles <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlaid <WH6823> them with gold. <WH2091>
He put <WH935> the poles <WH905> into the rings <WH2885> on the sides <WH6763> of the ark, <WH727> to bear <WH5375> the ark. <WH727>
He made <WH6213> a mercy seat <WH3727> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091> Its length <WH753> was two and a half <WH2677> cubits, <WH520> and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> its breadth. <WH7341>
He made <WH6213> two <WH8147> cherubim <WH3742> of gold. <WH2091> He made <WH6213> them of beaten work, <WH4749> at the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the mercy seat; <WH3727>

one <WH259> cherub <WH3742> at the one end, <WH7098> and one <WH259> cherub <WH3742> at the other end. <WH7098> He made <WH6213> the cherubim <WH3742> of one piece with the mercy seat <WH3727> at its two <WH8147> ends. <WH7098>

The cherubim <WH3742> spread out <WH6566> their wings <WH3671> on high, <WH4605> covering <WH5526> the mercy seat <WH3727> with their wings, <WH3671> with their faces <WH6440> toward one <WH376> another. <WH251> The faces <WH6440> of the cherubim <WH3742> were toward the mercy seat. <WH3727>

He made <WH6213> the table <WH7979> of acacia <WH7848> wood. <WH6086> Its length <WH753> was two cubits, <WH520> and its breadth <WH7341> was a cubit, <WH520> and its height <WH6967> was a cubit <WH520> and a half. <WH2677>
He overlaid <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> and made <WH6213> a gold <WH2091> molding <WH2213> around it. <WH5439>
He made <WH6213> a border <WH4526> of a handbreadth <WH2948> around <WH5439> it, <WH6213> and made a golden <WH2091> molding <WH2213> on its border <WH4526> around it. <WH5439>
He cast <WH3332> four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> for it, <WH5414> and put the rings <WH2885> in the four <WH702> corners <WH6285> that were on its four <WH702> feet. <WH7272>
The rings <WH2885> were close by <WH5980> the border, <WH4526> the places <WH1004> for the poles <WH905> to carry <WH5375> the table. <WH7979>
He made <WH6213> the poles <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlaid <WH6823> them with gold, <WH2091> to carry <WH5375> the table. <WH7979>

He made <WH6213> the vessels <WH3627> which were on the table, <WH7979> its dishes, <WH7086> its spoons, <WH3709> its bowls, <WH4518> and its pitchers <WH7184> with which <WH2004> to pour <WH5258> out, <WH2889> of pure gold. <WH2091>

He made <WH6213> the lampstand <WH4501> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091> He made <WH6213> the lampstand <WH4501> of beaten work. <WH4749> Its base, <WH3409> its shaft, <WH7070> its cups, <WH1375> its buds, <WH3730> and its flowers were of one piece with it. <WH6525>

There were six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going out <WH3318> of its sides: <WH6654> three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the lampstand <WH4501> out of its one <WH259> side, <WH6654> and three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the lampstand <WH4501> out of its other <WH8145> side: <WH6654>

three <WH7969> cups <WH1375> made like almond blossoms <WH8246> in one <WH259> branch, <WH7070> a bud <WH3730> and a flower, <WH6525> and three <WH7969> cups <WH1375> made like almond blossoms <WH8246> in the other <WH259> branch, <WH7070> a bud <WH3730> and a flower: <WH6525> so for the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going out <WH3318> of the lampstand. <WH4501>
In the lampstand <WH4501> were four <WH702> cups <WH1375> made like almond blossoms, <WH8246> its buds <WH3730> and its flowers; <WH6525>

and a bud <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of one piece with it, <WH3730> and a bud under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of one piece with it, <WH3730> and a bud under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of one piece with it, <WH8337> for the six branches <WH7070> going out of it. <WH3318>
Their buds <WH3730> and their branches <WH7070> were of one piece with it. <WH259> The whole thing was one beaten work <WH4749> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>
He made <WH6213> its seven <WH7651> lamps, <WH5216> and its snuffers, <WH4457> and its snuff dishes, <WH4289> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>
He made <WH6213> it of a talent <WH3603> of pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> with all its vessels. <WH3627>

He made <WH6213> the altar <WH4196> of incense <WH7004> of acacia <WH7848> wood. <WH6086> It was square: <WH7251> its length <WH753> was a cubit, <WH520> and its breadth <WH7341> a cubit. <WH520> Its height <WH6967> was two cubits. <WH520> Its horns were of one piece with it. <WH7161>

He overlaid <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> its top, <WH1406> its sides <WH7023> around <WH5439> it, <WH7161> and its horns. He made <WH6213> a gold <WH2091> molding <WH2213> around it. <WH5439>

He made <WH6213> two <WH8147> golden <WH2091> rings <WH2885> for it under its molding crown, <WH2213> on its two <WH8147> ribs, <WH6763> on its two <WH8147> sides, <WH6654> for places <WH1004> for poles <WH905> with which to carry it. <WH5375>
He made <WH6213> the poles <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlaid <WH6823> them with gold. <WH2091>
He made <WH6213> the holy <WH6944> anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> and the pure <WH2889> incense <WH7004> of sweet spices, <WH5561> after the art <WH4639> of the perfumer. <WH7543>
